attributes.action: Request the BBC in the strongest possible terms to change its policy over the DEC appeal on Gaza
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having listened to two senior managers of the BBC trying to defend its policy of not allowing the broadcast of the DEC appeal on Gaza we are outraged that an organisation funded by us can take such an appalling decision and ask that it be reversed immediately

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
